modal.win_body: Congrats! You've just crushed it and won the game. Now, bask in your glory and celebrate like a boss!
modal.loss_title: Oops! Tough Luck, But Don't Give Up!
modal.loss_body: You didn't quite make it this time, but hey, no worries! Give it another shot, and who knows, the next round might be your moment of glory! Keep going, champ!
